statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_management;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock > 0;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock < 10;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE last_update > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_update DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock < 10 ORDER BY current_stock ASC
SELECT product_name, last_update FROM inventory_management WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' OR product_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT product_name, current_stock, last_update FROM inventory_management WHERE last_update BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY last_update
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity, max_quantity FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity < max_quantity;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity_sold FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity >= 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 5 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, available_quantity, max_quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT sale_id, quantity_sold FROM sales WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01' AND sale_date < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY sale_id
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN sales ON inventory.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE sales.quantity_sold >= 10 ORDER BY inventory.product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock <= 10;
SELECT product_name, last_update FROM Inventory WHERE last_update >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > 0 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < 10;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, last_update FROM Inventory WHERE last_update BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY last_update ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date, order_status FROM Orders JOIN Inventory ON Orders.product_id = Inventory.product_id WHERE order_status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, stockout_date, reason FROM Stockouts JOIN Inventory ON Stockouts.product_id = Inventory.product_id WHERE stockout_date >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY stockout_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses LEFT JOIN inventory ON warehouses.warehouse_id = inventory.warehouse_id;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE stock_level < 50;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE stock_level < 10;
SELECT update_id, update_type, update_quantity FROM updates WHERE update_quantity > 50 ORDER BY update_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.amount, customers.customer_name FROM transactions JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id ORDER BY transactions.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
